---
title: "About"
---

This website is a tool to help with emergency preparedness.

-   **Mission**: To provide real-time, reliable information during emergencies.

-   **Purpose**: Ensuring community safety and preparedness.

-   **Commitment**: Delivering clear, actionable guidance.

-   **Updates**: Offering consistent, up-to-date emergency notifications.

-   **Connectivity**: Keeping the community connected for immediate response.

-   **Safety First**: Prioritizing your safety in urgent situations.

Remember, in times of crisis, every second counts. Stay informed and stay safe.
